answers.answer: There are a lot of things that could be going on, and unfortunately, no one here can do anything more than make wild guesses.Please let us know.  I hope everything is ok.

Sorry I won't even pretend to know. It sounds pretty serious because the doctor wants to see them asap, so guessing could cause more anxiety for you and you don't need any more right now. Please keep us posted.

question: Ok, im not sure what my sister has or what is wrong with her, but..My little sister is 16  she has dropped alot of weight she was already small but now is down to a size 0. She is very pale. She went to her doctor and they did some blood work because they found protein and blood in her urine. The doctor called my mom monday and wanted to see my mom and sister IMMEDIATELY but my sis was gone at the moment and they could not go in so the doctor said for them to come in 1st thing thursday morning (tomorrow) and they would see them 1st they would not have to wait. That it was urgent. It's really got me worried. I looked up protein/blood in urine and lots of thing come up, HIV, luekimia, bone marrow cancer, pregnancy, kidney cancer, diabetes..etc. I will find out tomorrow but im so worried anybody have any idea what it could be?
title: My 16 yr old sister. please help
